sentences.english: It is said that people will be sent to hell after death.
sentences.chinese: 传说中，人死后是要被送到阴曹地府的。

sentences.english: After Ghost Month, ghosts have to return to the underworld, and the Gates of Hell close.
sentences.chinese: 鬼月过了，鬼将回到阴曹地府，鬼门也会关上。

magistrate (during Tang and Song dynasties)/mythological underworld judge
